snippet: Conceding that he had not placed in the top three in Iowa, Mr. Gingrich nevertheless vowed to continue on and blasted the process of negative campaigning.
abstract: Conceding that he had not placed in the top three in Iowa, Mr. Gingrich nevertheless vowed to continue on and blasted the process of negative campaigning.
lead_paragraph: DES MOINES -- Newt Gingrich promised that a "great debate" in the Republican party will begin tomorrow in New Hampshire as he lashed out at Mitt Romney as a "Massachusetts moderate" who would not fundamentally fix the country's problems.
